Sub Click(Source As Button) Dim ws As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim session As New NotesSession Dim db As NotesDatabase Dim doc As NotesDocument Dim docPnt As NotesDocument
Set db = session.CurrentDatabase Set col = db.UnprocessedDocuments
If col.Count > 0 Then Set doc = col.GetFirstDocument
Set docPnt = db.CreateDocument Call doc.CopyAllItems(docPnt,True) docPnt.Form = doc.Form(0) + "Print" docPnt.MainDocID = doc.UniversalID Set uidocPnt = ws.EditDocument(False, docPnt , , , True)
End If End Sub

Sub Click(Source As Button) Dim ws As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim doc As NotesDocument Dim db As NotesDatabase Dim s As New NotesSession Dim coll As NotesDocumentCollection Dim uiv As NotesUIView Dim view As NotesView, postv As NotesView, departUN As NotesView, people As NotesView Dim tmpDoc As NotesDocument Dim tmpStr As String, curentDep As String, dep As String Dim i As Integer
Set db = ws.CurrentDatabase.Database Set uiv = ws.CurrentView Set view = uiv.View Set postv = db.GetView("ListPostsAll") Set departUN = db.GetView({(1.Подразделения\DepartUN)}) Set piople = db.GetView({Employees\ByFullName})
Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument dep = "" i = 0 Do Until doc Is Nothing If Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) = Lcase("IBA IT Park") Then currentDep = Lcase(doc.Otdel2(0)) Else currentDep = Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) End If If currentDep <> dep Then If Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) = Lcase("IBA IT Park") Then dep = Lcase(doc.Otdel2(0)) Else dep = Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) End If
If dep <> "мда" Then Close fileNum%
fileNum% = Freefile() i = i +1 If Not departUN Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = departUN.GetDocumentByKey(getDepartment(doc.DepartUN)) u= Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) If Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) => 1 Then depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(1) Else depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(0) End If End If If Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) = Lcase("IBA IT Park") Then fileName$ = "c:\new-temp\brusnikin\" & Cstr(i) & " - " & depNameENG & ".csv" ' doc.Otdel2(0) & ".csv" Else fileName$ = "c:\new-temp\brusnikin\" & Cstr(i) & " - " & depNameENG & ".csv" 'doc.Otdel1(0) & ".csv" End If Open FileName$ For Output As fileNum% tmpStr = {#"Email,First Name,Last Name,Job Title,Department,Phone Number,Location,Locale,Manager Email"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr End If If Lcase(doc.Otdel3(0)) <> Lcase("Институт ИТ и бизнес-администрирования") Then If doc.E_mail(0) = "" Then tmpStr = {#"noname@iba.by} Elseif Lcase(Strright(doc.E_mail(0), ".")) = Lcase("eu") Then tmpStr = {#"} & Strleft(doc.E_mail(0), "@") & "@iba.by" 'Elseif Strright(doc.E_mail(0), ".") = "kz" Then
Else tmpStr = {#"} & doc.E_mail(0) End If tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strconv(doc.EngFirstName(0), 3) tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strconv(doc.EngLastName(0), 3) If doc.JobTitle(0) = "Внештатный сотрудник" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",Freelancer" Else If Not postv Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = postv.GetDocumentByKey(doc.JobTitle(0)) If tmpDoc Is Nothing Then tmpStr = tmpStr & doc.JobTitle(0) & "," Else If Instr(1, tmpDoc.PostENG(0), ",", 5) > 0 Then tmpStr = tmpStr & {,"} & tmpDoc.PostENG(0) & {"} Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.PostENG(0) End If End If End If End If If Not departUN Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = departUN.GetDocumentByKey(getDepartment(doc.DepartUN)) u= Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) If Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) => 1 Then depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(1) Else depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(0) End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & depNameENG 'tmpStr = tmpStr & "," If doc.Otdel1(0) = "IBA Гомель" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA Gomel" Elseif doc.Otdel1(0) = "МДА" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA" Elseif Strleft(doc.Otdel1(0), " ") = "Департамент" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA IT Park" Else tmpStr = tmpStr & ",," & doc.Otdel1(0) End If tmpStr = tmpStr & ",ru_RU" Set tmpDoc = piople.GetDocumentByKey(doc.ChiefOtd(0)) If Not tmpDoc Is Nothing Then If Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "akoulich" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," Elseif Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "s_levteev" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," Else If Lcase(Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".")) = Lcase("eu") Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") & "@iba.by" 'Elseif Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".") = "kz" Then
Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.E_mail(0) End If End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & {"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr End If Set doc = view.GetNextDocument(doc) Loop Close fileNum% End Sub

Function getDepartment (DepartUN As Variant) As String 'Dim s As New NotesSession 'Dim cdb As NotesDatabase 'Dim strcode As String Dim idarr(3) As String
idarr(0) = "81" idarr(1) = "86" idarr(2) = "87" idarr(3) = "88"
'Set cdb = s.CurrentDatabase '"100z"+6. If DepartUN(0)="1" Then If Arraygetindex( idarr, DepartUN(1)) > 0 Then getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) & ";" & DepartUN(1) & ";" & DepartUN(2) Else getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) & ";" & DepartUN(1) End If Else getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) End If ' return getDepartment End Function

Function formatPhone (pon As String) As String Dim l As Integer Dim phone(15) As String Dim i As Integer Dim t As Boolean i = 14 l = Len(pon) 'pone = "+375"
For i = 11 To 0 Step -1 If (l <> 0) And Isnumeric(Right(Left(pon, l), 1)) Then phone(i) = Right(Left(pon, l), 1) l = l - 1 Elseif l <> 0 Then i = i + 1 l = l - 1 End If Next For i = 0 To Ubound(phone) formatPhone = formatPhone & phone(i) Next
End Function

Sub Click(Source As Button) Dim ws As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim arrayOfRecs() As RecType Dim i As Integer ' A dynamic array that will get sized to ' the number of lines in c:\123w\work\thenames.txt Dim txt As String Dim fileNum As Integer Dim counter As Integer Dim countRec As Integer Dim s As New NotesSession Dim db As NotesDatabase Dim piople As NotesView, view As NotesView Dim tmpDoc As NotesDocument, doc As NotesDocument
' Get an unused file number so LotusScript can open a file.
Set db = s.CurrentDatabase Set view = ws.CurrentView.View Set piople = db.GetView({Employees\ByFullName})
fileNum% = Freefile() counter% = 0 Open "D:\brusnikin\2\b.csv" For Input As fileNum% Do While Not Eof(fileNum%) ' Read each line of the file. Line Input #fileNum%, txt$ ' Increment the line count. counter% = counter% + 1 Loop ' Return the file pointer to the beginning of the file. Seek fileNum%, 1 ' The file has counter number of lines in it, so ' arrayOfRecs() is defined with that number of elements. Redim arrayOfRecs(1 To counter%) ' Read the contents of the file into arrayOfRecs. For countRec% = 1 To counter%
Input #fileNum%, arrayOfRecs(countRec%).FullName$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Email$
%REM arrayOfRecs(countRec%).URI$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).UserID$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).JobTitle$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Department$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).PhoneNumber$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Location$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Admin$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Source$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).CreationDate$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Claimed$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ClaimedDate$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ClaimLink$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Status$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).InvitedDate$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ManagerEmail$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).HasProfilePicture$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Followers$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).LoginApprovalsEnabled$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActivitySummaryforDate$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastDay$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastMonthonWorkplaceMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastWeekonWorkplaceMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastDayonWorkplaceMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastMonthonWorkChatMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastWeekonWorkChatMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastDayonWorkChatMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).MessagesLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).MessagesLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).MessagesLastDay$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).PostsLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).PostsLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).PostsLastDay$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).CommentsLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).CommentsLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).CommentsLastDay$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ContributorRankLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ContributorRankLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ContributorRankLastDay$ %ENDREM
Next Close fileNum% Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument Do Until doc Is Nothing For i = 1 To Ubound(arrayOfRecs) 'Set tmpDoc = piople.GetDocumentByKey(arrayOfRecs(i).FullName$) If Ucase(doc.E_mail(0)) = Ucase(arrayOfRecs(i).Email$) Then Call doc.ReplaceItemValue("a", "1") Call doc.Save(True, False) arrayOfRecs(i).Ready = True End If Next Set doc = view.GetNextDocument(doc) Loop Call filloutFile() fileNum% = Freefile() fileName$ = "d:\brusnikin\UsersWhoIsReady.csv" Open FileName$ For Output As fileNum% For i = 1 To Ubound(arrayOfRecs) If arrayOfRecs(i).Ready = False Then tmpStr = tmpStr & {#"} & arrayOfRecs(i).FullName$ & "," & arrayOfRecs(i).Email$ & {"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr End If Next Close fileNum% End Sub

Function filloutFile() Dim s As New NotesSession Dim ws As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim uiv As NotesUIView Dim doc As NotesDocument, tmpDoc As NotesDocument Dim view As NotesView, piople As NotesView, departUN As NotesView, postv As NotesView Dim tmpString As String Dim db As NotesDatabase

Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.E_mail(0) End If 'End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & {"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr
Call doc.RemoveItem("a") Call doc.Save(True, False) End If Set doc = view.GetNextDocument(doc) Loop Close fileNum% End Function

Else tmpStr = {#"} & doc.E_mail(0) End If tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strconv(doc.EngFirstName(0), 3) tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strconv(doc.EngLastName(0), 3) If doc.JobTitle(0) = "Внештатный сотрудник" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "Freelancer," Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," %REM If Not postv Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = postv.GetDocumentByKey(doc.JobTitle(0)) If tmpDoc Is Nothing Then tmpStr = tmpStr & doc.JobTitle(0) & "," Else If Instr(1, tmpDoc.PostENG(0), ",", 5) > 0 Then tmpStr = tmpStr & {,"} & tmpDoc.PostENG(0) & {"} Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.PostENG(0) End If End If End If %ENDREM End If %REM If Not departUN Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = departUN.GetDocumentByKey(getDepartment(doc.DepartUN)) u= Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) If Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) => 1 Then depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(1) Else depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(0) End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & depNameENG %ENDREM tmpStr = tmpStr & "," If doc.Otdel1(0) = "IBA Гомель" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA Gomel" Elseif doc.Otdel1(0) = "МДА" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA" Elseif Strleft(doc.Otdel1(0), " ") = "Департамент" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA IT Park" Else tmpStr = tmpStr & ",," & doc.Otdel1(0) End If
tmpStr = tmpStr & ",ru_RU" Set tmpDoc = piople.GetDocumentByKey(doc.ChiefOtd(0)) If Not tmpDoc Is Nothing Then 'If Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "akoulich" Then ' tmpStr = tmpStr & "," 'Elseif Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "s_levteev" Then ' tmpStr = tmpStr & "," 'Else If Lcase(Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".")) = Lcase("eu") Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") & "@iba.by" 'Elseif Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".") = "kz" Then
Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.E_mail(0) End If 'End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & {"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr
Call doc.RemoveItem("a") Call doc.Save(True, False) End If Set doc = view.GetNextDocument(doc) Loop Close fileNum% End Function

idarr(0) = "81" idarr(1) = "86" idarr(2) = "87" idarr(3) = "88"

If DepartUN(0)="1" Then If Arraygetindex( idarr, DepartUN(1)) > 0 Then getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) & ";" & DepartUN(1) & ";" & DepartUN(2) Else getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) & ";" & DepartUN(1) End If Else getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) End If ' return getDepartment End Function

Continue = False
Set uidoc = ws.CurrentDocument Set cdoc = uidoc.Document Set doc = Source.Documents.GetFirstDocument flg = ws.DialogBox ("(WorkExperience)", True, True, False, False, False, False, "Work Experience", doc, True) If flg Then Call doc.Save (True, False) Set db = session.CurrentDatabase Set view = db.GetView("(WExpDocuments)") Call view.Refresh Call ws.ViewRefresh End If End Sub

Continue = False
Set uidoc = ws.CurrentDocument Set cdoc = uidoc.Document Set doc = Source.Documents.GetFirstDocument flg = ws.DialogBox ("(WorkExperience)", True, True, False, False, False, False, "Work Experience", doc, True) If flg Then Call doc.Save (True, False) Set db = session.CurrentDatabase Set view = db.GetView("(WExpDocuments)") Call view.Refresh Call ws.ViewRefresh End If End Sub

code.lotusscript:
Sub Click(Source As Button) Dim ws As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim doc As NotesDocument Dim db As NotesDatabase Dim s As New NotesSession Dim coll As NotesDocumentCollection Dim uiv As NotesUIView Dim view As NotesView, postv As NotesView, departUN As NotesView, people As NotesView Dim tmpDoc As NotesDocument Dim tmpStr As String, curentDep As String, dep As String Dim i As Integer
Set db = ws.CurrentDatabase.Database Set uiv = ws.CurrentView Set view = uiv.View Set postv = db.GetView("ListPostsAll") Set departUN = db.GetView({(1.Подразделения\DepartUN)}) Set piople = db.GetView({Employees\ByFullName})
Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument dep = "" i = 0 Do Until doc Is Nothing If Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) = Lcase("IBA IT Park") Then currentDep = Lcase(doc.Otdel2(0)) Else currentDep = Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) End If If currentDep <> dep Then If Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) = Lcase("IBA IT Park") Then dep = Lcase(doc.Otdel2(0)) Else dep = Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) End If
If dep <> "мда" Then Close fileNum%
fileNum% = Freefile() i = i +1 If Not departUN Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = departUN.GetDocumentByKey(getDepartment(doc.DepartUN)) u= Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) If Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) => 1 Then depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(1) Else depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(0) End If End If If Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) = Lcase("IBA IT Park") Then fileName$ = "c:\new-temp\brusnikin\" & Cstr(i) & " - " & depNameENG & ".csv" ' doc.Otdel2(0) & ".csv" Else fileName$ = "c:\new-temp\brusnikin\" & Cstr(i) & " - " & depNameENG & ".csv" 'doc.Otdel1(0) & ".csv" End If Open FileName$ For Output As fileNum% tmpStr = {#"Email,First Name,Last Name,Job Title,Department,Phone Number,Location,Locale,Manager Email"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr End If If Lcase(doc.Otdel3(0)) <> Lcase("Институт ИТ и бизнес-администрирования") Then If doc.E_mail(0) = "" Then tmpStr = {#"noname@iba.by} Elseif Lcase(Strright(doc.E_mail(0), ".")) = Lcase("eu") Then tmpStr = {#"} & Strleft(doc.E_mail(0), "@") & "@iba.by" 'Elseif Strright(doc.E_mail(0), ".") = "kz" Then
Else tmpStr = {#"} & doc.E_mail(0) End If tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strconv(doc.EngFirstName(0), 3) tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strconv(doc.EngLastName(0), 3) If doc.JobTitle(0) = "Внештатный сотрудник" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",Freelancer" Else If Not postv Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = postv.GetDocumentByKey(doc.JobTitle(0)) If tmpDoc Is Nothing Then tmpStr = tmpStr & doc.JobTitle(0) & "," Else If Instr(1, tmpDoc.PostENG(0), ",", 5) > 0 Then tmpStr = tmpStr & {,"} & tmpDoc.PostENG(0) & {"} Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.PostENG(0) End If End If End If End If If Not departUN Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = departUN.GetDocumentByKey(getDepartment(doc.DepartUN)) u= Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) If Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) => 1 Then depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(1) Else depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(0) End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & depNameENG 'tmpStr = tmpStr & "," If doc.Otdel1(0) = "IBA Гомель" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA Gomel" Elseif doc.Otdel1(0) = "МДА" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA" Elseif Strleft(doc.Otdel1(0), " ") = "Департамент" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA IT Park" Else tmpStr = tmpStr & ",," & doc.Otdel1(0) End If tmpStr = tmpStr & ",ru_RU" Set tmpDoc = piople.GetDocumentByKey(doc.ChiefOtd(0)) If Not tmpDoc Is Nothing Then If Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "akoulich" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," Elseif Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "s_levteev" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," Else If Lcase(Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".")) = Lcase("eu") Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") & "@iba.by" 'Elseif Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".") = "kz" Then
Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.E_mail(0) End If End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & {"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr End If Set doc = view.GetNextDocument(doc) Loop Close fileNum% End Sub

Function getDepartment (DepartUN As Variant) As String 'Dim s As New NotesSession 'Dim cdb As NotesDatabase 'Dim strcode As String Dim idarr(3) As String
idarr(0) = "81" idarr(1) = "86" idarr(2) = "87" idarr(3) = "88"
'Set cdb = s.CurrentDatabase '"100z"+6. If DepartUN(0)="1" Then If Arraygetindex( idarr, DepartUN(1)) > 0 Then getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) & ";" & DepartUN(1) & ";" & DepartUN(2) Else getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) & ";" & DepartUN(1) End If Else getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) End If ' return getDepartment End Function

Function formatPhone (pon As String) As String Dim l As Integer Dim phone(15) As String Dim i As Integer Dim t As Boolean i = 14 l = Len(pon) 'pone = "+375"
For i = 11 To 0 Step -1 If (l <> 0) And Isnumeric(Right(Left(pon, l), 1)) Then phone(i) = Right(Left(pon, l), 1) l = l - 1 Elseif l <> 0 Then i = i + 1 l = l - 1 End If Next For i = 0 To Ubound(phone) formatPhone = formatPhone & phone(i) Next
End Function

Function formatPhone (pon As String) As String Dim l As Integer Dim phone(15) As String Dim i As Integer Dim t As Boolean i = 14 l = Len(pon) 'pone = "+375"
For i = 11 To 0 Step -1 If (l <> 0) And Isnumeric(Right(Left(pon, l), 1)) Then phone(i) = Right(Left(pon, l), 1) l = l - 1 Elseif l <> 0 Then i = i + 1 l = l - 1 End If Next For i = 0 To Ubound(phone) formatPhone = formatPhone & phone(i) Next
End Function

Sub Click(Source As Button) Dim ws As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim arrayOfRecs() As RecType Dim i As Integer ' A dynamic array that will get sized to ' the number of lines in c:\123w\work\thenames.txt Dim txt As String Dim fileNum As Integer Dim counter As Integer Dim countRec As Integer Dim s As New NotesSession Dim db As NotesDatabase Dim piople As NotesView, view As NotesView Dim tmpDoc As NotesDocument, doc As NotesDocument
' Get an unused file number so LotusScript can open a file.
Set db = s.CurrentDatabase Set view = ws.CurrentView.View Set piople = db.GetView({Employees\ByFullName})
fileNum% = Freefile() counter% = 0 Open "D:\brusnikin\2\b.csv" For Input As fileNum% Do While Not Eof(fileNum%) ' Read each line of the file. Line Input #fileNum%, txt$ ' Increment the line count. counter% = counter% + 1 Loop ' Return the file pointer to the beginning of the file. Seek fileNum%, 1 ' The file has counter number of lines in it, so ' arrayOfRecs() is defined with that number of elements. Redim arrayOfRecs(1 To counter%) ' Read the contents of the file into arrayOfRecs. For countRec% = 1 To counter%
Input #fileNum%, arrayOfRecs(countRec%).FullName$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Email$
%REM arrayOfRecs(countRec%).URI$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).UserID$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).JobTitle$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Department$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).PhoneNumber$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Location$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Admin$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Source$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).CreationDate$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Claimed$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ClaimedDate$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ClaimLink$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Status$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).InvitedDate$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ManagerEmail$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).HasProfilePicture$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Followers$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).LoginApprovalsEnabled$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActivitySummaryforDate$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastDay$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastMonthonWorkplaceMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastWeekonWorkplaceMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastDayonWorkplaceMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastMonthonWorkChatMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastWeekonWorkChatMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastDayonWorkChatMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).MessagesLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).MessagesLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).MessagesLastDay$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).PostsLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).PostsLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).PostsLastDay$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).CommentsLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).CommentsLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).CommentsLastDay$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ContributorRankLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ContributorRankLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ContributorRankLastDay$ %ENDREM
Next Close fileNum% Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument Do Until doc Is Nothing For i = 1 To Ubound(arrayOfRecs) 'Set tmpDoc = piople.GetDocumentByKey(arrayOfRecs(i).FullName$) If Ucase(doc.E_mail(0)) = Ucase(arrayOfRecs(i).Email$) Then Call doc.ReplaceItemValue("a", "1") Call doc.Save(True, False) arrayOfRecs(i).Ready = True End If Next Set doc = view.GetNextDocument(doc) Loop Call filloutFile() fileNum% = Freefile() fileName$ = "d:\brusnikin\UsersWhoIsReady.csv" Open FileName$ For Output As fileNum% For i = 1 To Ubound(arrayOfRecs) If arrayOfRecs(i).Ready = False Then tmpStr = tmpStr & {#"} & arrayOfRecs(i).FullName$ & "," & arrayOfRecs(i).Email$ & {"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr End If Next Close fileNum% End Sub

Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.E_mail(0) End If 'End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & {"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr

Sub Click(Source As Button) Dim session As New NotesSession Dim workspace As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim db As NotesDatabase Dim collEmployees As NotesDocumentCollection Dim docEmployee As NotesDocument Dim docPhotograph As NotesDocument
Set db = session.CurrentDatabase Set collEmployees = workspace.PickListCollection(1, 0, db.Server, db.FilePath, "AlfavitPick", "Список сотрудников","Укажите сотрудника, для которого добавляете фото:") If collEmployees.Count > 0 Then Set docEmployee = collEmployees.GetFirstDocument
If checkHasPhotograph(docEmployee) = False Then Set docPhotograph = createPhotographDocument(docEmployee) If Not docPhotograph Is Nothing Then Call workspace.EditDocument(True, docPhotograph) End If Else askme = Msgbox("Фотография сотрудника " & docEmployee.FullName(0) & " уже имеется в базе. Открыть её для редактирования?",4+32,"Уточнение")
If askme = 6 Then Redim keys(1) As String keys(0) = docEmployee.FullName(0) keys(1) = Cstr(Fix(docEmployee.Birthday(0)))
Set docPhotograph = getPhotographDocumentByKey(keys) If Not docPhotograph Is Nothing Then Call workspace.EditDocument(True, docPhotograph) End If End If End If End If End Sub

Sub Click(Source As Button) Set w = New NotesUIWorkspace Set session = New NotesSession Set db = session.CurrentDatabase Set docTemp = db.CreateDocument docTemp.Form = "IconDescription" docTemp.IconType = "Фотографии"
Set note = w.EditDocument(False, docTemp) Exit Sub End Sub

code.lotusscript:
Sub Click(Source As Button) Dim ws As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim doc As NotesDocument Dim db As NotesDatabase Dim s As New NotesSession Dim coll As NotesDocumentCollection Dim uiv As NotesUIView Dim view As NotesView, postv As NotesView, departUN As NotesView, people As NotesView Dim tmpDoc As NotesDocument Dim tmpStr As String, curentDep As String, dep As String Dim i As Integer
Set db = ws.CurrentDatabase.Database Set uiv = ws.CurrentView Set view = uiv.View Set postv = db.GetView("ListPostsAll") Set departUN = db.GetView({(1.Подразделения\DepartUN)}) Set piople = db.GetView({Employees\ByFullName})
Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument dep = "" i = 0 Do Until doc Is Nothing If Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) = Lcase("IBA IT Park") Then currentDep = Lcase(doc.Otdel2(0)) Else currentDep = Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) End If If currentDep <> dep Then If Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) = Lcase("IBA IT Park") Then dep = Lcase(doc.Otdel2(0)) Else dep = Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) End If
If dep <> "мда" Then Close fileNum%
fileNum% = Freefile() i = i +1 If Not departUN Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = departUN.GetDocumentByKey(getDepartment(doc.DepartUN)) u= Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) If Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) => 1 Then depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(1) Else depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(0) End If End If If Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) = Lcase("IBA IT Park") Then fileName$ = "c:\new-temp\brusnikin\" & Cstr(i) & " - " & depNameENG & ".csv" ' doc.Otdel2(0) & ".csv" Else fileName$ = "c:\new-temp\brusnikin\" & Cstr(i) & " - " & depNameENG & ".csv" 'doc.Otdel1(0) & ".csv" End If Open FileName$ For Output As fileNum% tmpStr = {#"Email,First Name,Last Name,Job Title,Department,Phone Number,Location,Locale,Manager Email"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr End If If Lcase(doc.Otdel3(0)) <> Lcase("Институт ИТ и бизнес-администрирования") Then If doc.E_mail(0) = "" Then tmpStr = {#"noname@iba.by} Elseif Lcase(Strright(doc.E_mail(0), ".")) = Lcase("eu") Then tmpStr = {#"} & Strleft(doc.E_mail(0), "@") & "@iba.by" 'Elseif Strright(doc.E_mail(0), ".") = "kz" Then
Else tmpStr = {#"} & doc.E_mail(0) End If tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strconv(doc.EngFirstName(0), 3) tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strconv(doc.EngLastName(0), 3) If doc.JobTitle(0) = "Внештатный сотрудник" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",Freelancer" Else If Not postv Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = postv.GetDocumentByKey(doc.JobTitle(0)) If tmpDoc Is Nothing Then tmpStr = tmpStr & doc.JobTitle(0) & "," Else If Instr(1, tmpDoc.PostENG(0), ",", 5) > 0 Then tmpStr = tmpStr & {,"} & tmpDoc.PostENG(0) & {"} Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.PostENG(0) End If End If End If End If If Not departUN Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = departUN.GetDocumentByKey(getDepartment(doc.DepartUN)) u= Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) If Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) => 1 Then depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(1) Else depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(0) End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & depNameENG 'tmpStr = tmpStr & "," If doc.Otdel1(0) = "IBA Гомель" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA Gomel" Elseif doc.Otdel1(0) = "МДА" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA" Elseif Strleft(doc.Otdel1(0), " ") = "Департамент" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA IT Park" Else tmpStr = tmpStr & ",," & doc.Otdel1(0) End If tmpStr = tmpStr & ",ru_RU" Set tmpDoc = piople.GetDocumentByKey(doc.ChiefOtd(0)) If Not tmpDoc Is Nothing Then If Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "akoulich" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," Elseif Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "s_levteev" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," Else If Lcase(Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".")) = Lcase("eu") Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") & "@iba.by" 'Elseif Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".") = "kz" Then
Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.E_mail(0) End If End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & {"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr End If Set doc = view.GetNextDocument(doc) Loop Close fileNum% End Sub

Function getDepartment (DepartUN As Variant) As String 'Dim s As New NotesSession 'Dim cdb As NotesDatabase 'Dim strcode As String Dim idarr(3) As String
idarr(0) = "81" idarr(1) = "86" idarr(2) = "87" idarr(3) = "88"
'Set cdb = s.CurrentDatabase '"100z"+6. If DepartUN(0)="1" Then If Arraygetindex( idarr, DepartUN(1)) > 0 Then getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) & ";" & DepartUN(1) & ";" & DepartUN(2) Else getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) & ";" & DepartUN(1) End If Else getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) End If ' return getDepartment End Function

Function formatPhone (pon As String) As String Dim l As Integer Dim phone(15) As String Dim i As Integer Dim t As Boolean i = 14 l = Len(pon) 'pone = "+375"
For i = 11 To 0 Step -1 If (l <> 0) And Isnumeric(Right(Left(pon, l), 1)) Then phone(i) = Right(Left(pon, l), 1) l = l - 1 Elseif l <> 0 Then i = i + 1 l = l - 1 End If Next For i = 0 To Ubound(phone) formatPhone = formatPhone & phone(i) Next
End Function

Else tmpStr = {#"} & doc.E_mail(0) End If tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strconv(doc.EngFirstName(0), 3) tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strconv(doc.EngLastName(0), 3) If doc.JobTitle(0) = "Внештатный сотрудник" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",Freelancer" Else If Not postv Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = postv.GetDocumentByKey(doc.JobTitle(0)) If tmpDoc Is Nothing Then tmpStr = tmpStr & doc.JobTitle(0) & "," Else If Instr(1, tmpDoc.PostENG(0), ",", 5) > 0 Then tmpStr = tmpStr & {,"} & tmpDoc.PostENG(0) & {"} Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.PostENG(0) End If End If End If End If If Lcase(doc.Otdel3(0)) <> Lcase("Институт ИТ и бизнес-администрирования") Then If Not departUN Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = departUN.GetDocumentByKey(getDepartment(doc.DepartUN)) u= Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) If Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) => 1 Then depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(1) Else depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(0) End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & depNameENG Else tmpStr = tmpStr & ",Institute of IT&Business Administration" End If 'tmpStr = tmpStr & "," If doc.Otdel1(0) = "IBA Гомель" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA Gomel" Elseif doc.Otdel1(0) = "МДА" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA" Elseif Strleft(doc.Otdel1(0), " ") = "Департамент" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA IT Park" Else tmpStr = tmpStr & ",," & doc.Otdel1(0) End If tmpStr = tmpStr & ",ru_RU" Set tmpDoc = piople.GetDocumentByKey(doc.ChiefOtd(0)) If Not tmpDoc Is Nothing Then 'If Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "akoulich" Then ' tmpStr = tmpStr & "," 'If Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "s_levteev" Then ' tmpStr = tmpStr & "," 'Else If Lcase(Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".")) = Lcase("eu") Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") & "@iba.by" 'Elseif Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".") = "kz" Then

Function getDepartment (DepartUN As Variant) As String 'Dim s As New NotesSession 'Dim cdb As NotesDatabase 'Dim strcode As String Dim idarr(3) As String
idarr(0) = "81" idarr(1) = "86" idarr(2) = "87" idarr(3) = "88"
'Set cdb = s.CurrentDatabase '"100z"+6. If DepartUN(0)="1" Then If Arraygetindex( idarr, DepartUN(1)) > 0 Then getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) & ";" & DepartUN(1) & ";" & DepartUN(2) If Ubound(DepartUN) > 1 Then If DepartUN(2) = "360" Then getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) & ";" & DepartUN(1) & ";" & DepartUN(2) End If Else getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) & ";" & DepartUN(1) End If Else getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) End If ' return getDepartment End Function

Type RecType FullName As String Email As String Ready As Boolean %REM URI As String UserID As String JobTitle As String Department As String PhoneNumber As String Location As String Admin As String Source As String CreationDate As String Claimed As String ClaimedDate As String ClaimLink As String Status As String InvitedDate As String ManagerEmail As String HasProfilePicture As String Followers As String LoginApprovalsEnabled As String ActivitySummaryforDate As String ActiveLastMonth As String ActiveLastWeek As String ActiveLastDay As String ActiveLastMonthonWorkplaceMobileApp As String ActiveLastWeekonWorkplaceMobileApp As String ActiveLastDayonWorkplaceMobileApp As String ActiveLastMonthonWorkChatMobileApp As String ActiveLastWeekonWorkChatMobileApp As String ActiveLastDayonWorkChatMobileApp As String MessagesLastMonth As String MessagesLastWeek As String MessagesLastDay As String PostsLastMonth As String PostsLastWeek As String PostsLastDay As String CommentsLastMonth As String CommentsLastWeek As String CommentsLastDay As String ContributorRankLastMonth As String ContributorRankLastWeek As String ContributorRankLastDay As String %ENDREM End Type

Sub Click(Source As Button) Dim ws As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim arrayOfRecs() As RecType Dim i As Integer ' A dynamic array that will get sized to ' the number of lines in c:\123w\work\thenames.txt Dim txt As String Dim fileNum As Integer Dim counter As Integer Dim countRec As Integer Dim s As New NotesSession Dim db As NotesDatabase Dim piople As NotesView, view As NotesView Dim tmpDoc As NotesDocument, doc As NotesDocument
' Get an unused file number so LotusScript can open a file.
Set db = s.CurrentDatabase Set view = ws.CurrentView.View Set piople = db.GetView({Employees\ByFullName})
fileNum% = Freefile() counter% = 0 Open "D:\brusnikin\2\b.csv" For Input As fileNum% Do While Not Eof(fileNum%) ' Read each line of the file. Line Input #fileNum%, txt$ ' Increment the line count. counter% = counter% + 1 Loop ' Return the file pointer to the beginning of the file. Seek fileNum%, 1 ' The file has counter number of lines in it, so ' arrayOfRecs() is defined with that number of elements. Redim arrayOfRecs(1 To counter%) ' Read the contents of the file into arrayOfRecs. For countRec% = 1 To counter%
Input #fileNum%, arrayOfRecs(countRec%).FullName$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Email$

Function filloutFile() Dim s As New NotesSession Dim ws As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim uiv As NotesUIView Dim doc As NotesDocument, tmpDoc As NotesDocument Dim view As NotesView, piople As NotesView, departUN As NotesView, postv As NotesView Dim tmpString As String Dim db As NotesDatabase
Set db = s.CurrentDatabase Set uiv = ws.CurrentView Set view = uiv.View Set postv = db.GetView("ListPostsAll") Set departUN = db.GetView({(1.Подразделения\DepartUN)}) Set piople = db.GetView({Employees\ByFullName})
Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument
fileNum% = Freefile() fileName$ = "d:\brusnikin\Users.csv" Open FileName$ For Output As fileNum% tmpStr = {#"Email,First Name,Last Name,Job Title,Department,Phone Number,Location,Locale,Manager Email"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr
Do Until doc Is Nothing If doc.a(0) <> "" Then If doc.E_mail(0) = "" Then tmpStr = {#"noname@iba.by} Elseif Strright(doc.E_mail(0), ".") = "eu" Then tmpStr = {#"} & Strleft(doc.E_mail(0), "@") & "@iba.by" 'Elseif Strright(doc.E_mail(0), ".") = "kz" Then
Else tmpStr = {#"} & doc.E_mail(0) End If tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strconv(doc.EngFirstName(0), 3) tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strconv(doc.EngLastName(0), 3) If doc.JobTitle(0) = "Внештатный сотрудник" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "Freelancer," Else If Not postv Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = postv.GetDocumentByKey(doc.JobTitle(0)) If tmpDoc Is Nothing Then tmpStr = tmpStr & doc.JobTitle(0) & "," Else If Instr(1, tmpDoc.PostENG(0), ",", 5) > 0 Then tmpStr = tmpStr & {,"} & tmpDoc.PostENG(0) & {"} Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.PostENG(0) End If End If End If End If If Not departUN Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = departUN.GetDocumentByKey(getDepartment(doc.DepartUN)) u= Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) If Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) => 1 Then depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(1) Else depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(0) End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & depNameENG 'tmpStr = tmpStr & "," If doc.Otdel1(0) = "IBA Гомель" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA Gomel" Elseif doc.Otdel1(0) = "МДА" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA" Elseif Strleft(doc.Otdel1(0), " ") = "Департамент" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA IT Park" Else tmpStr = tmpStr & ",," & doc.Otdel1(0) End If tmpStr = tmpStr & ",ru_RU" Set tmpDoc = piople.GetDocumentByKey(doc.ChiefOtd(0)) If Not tmpDoc Is Nothing Then 'If Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "akoulich" Then ' tmpStr = tmpStr & "," 'Elseif Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "s_levteev" Then ' tmpStr = tmpStr & "," 'Else If Lcase(Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".")) = Lcase("eu") Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") & "@iba.by" 'Elseif Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".") = "kz" Then
Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.E_mail(0) End If 'End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & {"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr
Call doc.RemoveItem("a") Call doc.Save(True, False) End If Set doc = view.GetNextDocument(doc) Loop Close fileNum% End Function

Next Close fileNum% Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument Do Until doc Is Nothing For i = 1 To Ubound(arrayOfRecs) 'Set tmpDoc = piople.GetDocumentByKey(arrayOfRecs(i).FullName$) If Ucase(doc.FullName(0)) = Ucase(arrayOfRecs(i).FullName$) Then Call doc.ReplaceItemValue("a", "1") Call doc.Save(True, False) arrayOfRecs(i).Ready = True End If Next Set doc = view.GetNextDocument(doc) Loop Call filloutFile() fileNum% = Freefile() fileName$ = "d:\brusnikin\UsersWhoIsReady.csv" Open FileName$ For Output As fileNum% For i = 1 To Ubound(arrayOfRecs) If arrayOfRecs(i).Ready = False Then tmpStr = tmpStr & {#"} & arrayOfRecs(i).FullName$ & "," & arrayOfRecs(i).Email$ & {"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr End If Next Close fileNum% End Sub

tmpStr = tmpStr & ",ru_RU" Set tmpDoc = piople.GetDocumentByKey(doc.ChiefOtd(0)) If Not tmpDoc Is Nothing Then 'If Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "akoulich" Then ' tmpStr = tmpStr & "," 'Elseif Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "s_levteev" Then ' tmpStr = tmpStr & "," 'Else If Lcase(Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".")) = Lcase("eu") Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") & "@iba.by" 'Elseif Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".") = "kz" Then

Sub Terminate
End Sub

Sub Click(Source As Button) Dim session As New NotesSession Dim workspace As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim db As NotesDatabase Dim collEmployees As NotesDocumentCollection Dim docEmployee As NotesDocument Dim docPhotograph As NotesDocument
Set db = session.CurrentDatabase Set collEmployees = workspace.PickListCollection(1, 0, db.Server, db.FilePath, "AlfavitPick", "Список сотрудников","Укажите сотрудника, для которого добавляете фото:") If collEmployees.Count > 0 Then Set docEmployee = collEmployees.GetFirstDocument
If checkHasPhotograph(docEmployee) = False Then Set docPhotograph = createPhotographDocument(docEmployee) If Not docPhotograph Is Nothing Then Call workspace.EditDocument(True, docPhotograph) End If Else askme = Msgbox("Фотография сотрудника " & docEmployee.FullName(0) & " уже имеется в базе. Открыть её для редактирования?",4+32,"Уточнение")
If askme = 6 Then Redim keys(1) As String keys(0) = docEmployee.FullName(0) keys(1) = Cstr(Fix(docEmployee.Birthday(0)))
Set docPhotograph = getPhotographDocumentByKey(keys) If Not docPhotograph Is Nothing Then Call workspace.EditDocument(True, docPhotograph) End If End If End If End If End Sub

Sub Click(Source As Button) On Error Goto finish Dim s As New NotesSession Dim ws As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim db As NotesDatabase, curDb As NotesDatabase Dim uidoc As NotesUIDocument Dim uiview As NotesUIView Dim newDoc As NotesDocument, donarDoc As NotesDocument 'Dim id As String
Set curDb = s.CurrentDatabase Set uiview = ws.CurrentView 'id = uiview.CaretNoteID Set donarDoc = curDB.GetDocumentByID(uiview.CaretNoteID) If Not donarDoc Is Nothing Then Set db = s.GetDatabase(ws.CurrentDatabase.Database.Server, "iba\WeekEndWork.nsf", False) Set uidoc = ws.ComposeDocument(db.Server, db.FilePath, "guestPerson", True) Set newDoc = uidoc.Document Call newDoc.ReplaceItemValue("guestName", donarDoc.FullName(0)) Call newDoc.ReplaceItemValue("guestType", "0") Call newDoc.ReplaceItemValue("fromCadr", "1") Else Messagebox "Ни один документ не выбран. Выберите документ конкретной персоны." Exit Sub End If
Exit Sub finish: Print {########### Error on click the button инфокадры перемещения\спискидляохраныОформление "Зарегистрировать посетителя" line -- } & Erl & " name -- " & Cstr(Err) & " " & Error$ Resume fin fin: End Sub

code.lotusscript: Sub Click(Source As Button) Dim ses As New notesSession Dim db As notesDatabase Dim ws As New NotesUIWorkspace Set db = ses.CurrentDatabase Set col = db.UnprocessedDocuments Set doc = col.getfirstDocument doc.JobTitle1 = doc.JobTitle doc.Save 1,0 ws.ViewRefresh End Sub

Sub Click(Source As Button) Dim ws As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim session As New NotesSession Dim db As NotesDatabase Dim docsetup As NotesDocument Dim maildoc As NotesDocument Dim rtitem As NotesRichTextItem Dim ukdoc As NotesDocument Dim uname As NotesName Dim coll As NotesDocumentCollection
Set db = session.CurrentDatabase
%REM Dim dialogdoc As NotesDocument
Set dialogdoc = New NotesDocument( db ) Call dialogdoc.ReplaceItemValue("Who","1") Call dialogdoc.ReplaceItemValue("WhoName","")
If Not ws.DialogBox ( "dlg_name", True, True, False, True, False, False, "Выберите сотрудника", dialogdoc, False) Then Exit Sub End If If dialogdoc.who(0) = "1" Then Set uname = New NotesName( session.UserName ) Else If dialogdoc.who(0) = "2" Then If dialogdoc.WhoName(0) <> "" Then Set uname = New NotesName( dialogdoc.WhoName(0) ) Else Msgbox "Выберите сотрудника", 0+16, "Stop !" Exit Sub End If Else Exit Sub End If End If Set ukdoc = db.GetView("NA").GetDocumentByKey(uname.Common) %END REM Set coll = db.UnprocessedDocuments If Not coll Is Nothing Then If coll.count>0 Then Set ukdoc = coll.GetFirstDocument End If End If
If ukdoc Is Nothing Then Msgbox "Не найден документ сотрудника", 0+16, "Stop !" Exit Sub End If
Set docSetup = db.GetView("SetupAll").GetDocumentByKey(ukdoc.CompanyName(0)) If docSetup Is Nothing Then Msgbox "Не сформирован документ настройки приложения. Обратитесь к администратору базы данных.", 0+16, "Stop !" Exit Sub End If
If Msgbox ("Создаётся запрос на оформление формы 1-ВВ для"+Chr(10)+Chr(10)+Ucase(ukdoc.fullname(0)), 1+32, "Уточнение !") = 1 Then Set maildoc = New NotesDocument(db) Set rtitem = New NotesRichTextItem(maildoc, "Body") Call maildoc.CopyItem(docsetup.GetFirstItem("AdminBD_2"),"sendto") 'maildoc.BlindCopyTo = "Alena Mitrafanava" Call maildoc.ReplaceItemValue("Subject","ИНФОКАДРЫ: Запрос на оформление формы 1-ВВ для "+ ukdoc.fullname(0)) Call maildoc.ReplaceItemValue("Form","Memo") Call maildoc.ReplaceItemValue("Body","Прошу оформить форму 1-ВВ для: "+_ ukdoc.fullname(0)+ Chr(10)+Chr(10)+_ "Если ранее Вы не получали форму 1-ВВ с помощью данной базы, укажите, пожалуйста, информацию о предыдущих местах работы (учебы) за последние 10 лет в виде:" +_ Chr(10)+ "Место работы (учебы), должность (студент) Адрес организации (Учебного заведения) ") Call ws.EditDocument("true",maildoc) End If
End Sub

Set docTemp = db.CreateDocument docTemp.Form = "IconDescription" docTemp.IconType = "Учетные карточки"
Set note = w.EditDocument(False, docTemp)
Exit Sub
End Sub

Sub Click(Source As Button) Dim ses As New notesSession Dim ws As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim db As NotesDatabase Dim view As NotesView Dim col As NotesViewEntryCollection Dim doc As notesDocument
Set db = ses.CurrentDatabase Set view = db.GetView("Jobsss") Set col = view.AllEntries For i = 1 To col.count Set doc = col.GetNthEntry(i).document Call Actualization(db,doc,"script") doc.save 1,0 Next ' Set doc = col.GetFirstDocument Msgbox "канец!"
End Sub

SELECT @Contains(Type; "Dvij") &a_BackStatus = "11" &(Form = "Перемещение" | Form = "Прием на работу")& @Year(DateRequest1) = @Year(@Today) &TypeMove!="0" & (@Month(@Today) = @Month(DateRequest1))
&NFilialVirt !=7 &NFilialVirt !=9& NewJobTitle1 !="Уборщик" & NewJobTitle1 !="Уборщик территории" & NewJobTitle1 != "водитель автомобиля" & NewJobTitle1 != "Тренер по спорту" & NewJobTitle1 != "Комендант" & NewJobTitle1 != "Диспетчер" & !@Contains(NewJobTitle1;"Водитель") & !@Contains(NewJobTitle1;"Контролёр") & !@Contains(NewJobTitle1;"онтролер") & !@Contains(NewJobTitle1;"онтролёр") & !@Contains(NewJobTitle1;"Слесарь")& !@Contains(NewJobTitle1;"Рабочий")& !@Contains(NewJobTitle1;"складом") & !@Contains(NewJobTitle1;"монтажник") & !@Contains(NewJobTitle1;"кспедитор") & !@Contains(NewJobTitle1;"Инструктор")& !@Contains(NewJobTitle1;"электрик")& !@Contains(NewJobTitle1;"КИП и А")& !@Contains(JobTitle1;"монтажник")& !@Contains(JobTitle1;"монтер")& TCmove !="1" ; REM{&Lastname = "Тунгатаров" & Fullname = "Шенелёв Дмитрий Васильевич"&& Fullname = "Александрович Алина Александровна" |(@Month(@Today)-1) = @Month(DateRequest1)|(@Month(@Today)-2) = @Month(DateRequest1)&TCmove !="1"};

@If(Form = "Прием на работу" ; "1"; Form = "Перемещение"; "2"; Form = "ПеремещениеMult"; "3"; Form = "Перевод в штат"; "4"; Form = "Перевод в штатMult"; "5"; Form = "Продолжительность"; "6"; Form = "Передвижение"; "7"; "8" )

@If(!@If(@IsMember("[ОК]"; @UserRoles)) & !@If(@IsMember("[DbClerk]"; @UserRoles)) ; @Do(@Prompt([Ok]; "ЗАЩИТА ДОСТУПА"; "Вы не можете выполнить данную операцию"); @Return("")); ""); @Command([ToolsRunMacro]; "(История)")

code.lotusscript:
Sub Click(Source As Button) Dim ws As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim doc As NotesDocument Dim db As NotesDatabase Dim s As New NotesSession Dim coll As NotesDocumentCollection Dim uiv As NotesUIView Dim view As NotesView, postv As NotesView, departUN As NotesView, people As NotesView Dim tmpDoc As NotesDocument Dim tmpStr As String, curentDep As String, dep As String Dim i As Integer
Set db = ws.CurrentDatabase.Database Set uiv = ws.CurrentView Set view = uiv.View Set postv = db.GetView("ListPostsAll") Set departUN = db.GetView({(1.Подразделения\DepartUN)}) Set piople = db.GetView({Employees\ByFullName})
Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument dep = "" i = 0 Do Until doc Is Nothing If Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) = Lcase("IBA IT Park") Then currentDep = Lcase(doc.Otdel2(0)) Else currentDep = Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) End If If currentDep <> dep Then If Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) = Lcase("IBA IT Park") Then dep = Lcase(doc.Otdel2(0)) Else dep = Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) End If
If dep <> "мда" Then Close fileNum%
fileNum% = Freefile() i = i +1 If Not departUN Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = departUN.GetDocumentByKey(getDepartment(doc.DepartUN)) u= Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) If Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) => 1 Then depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(1) Else depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(0) End If End If If Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) = Lcase("IBA IT Park") Then fileName$ = "c:\new-temp\brusnikin\" & Cstr(i) & " - " & depNameENG & ".csv" ' doc.Otdel2(0) & ".csv" Else fileName$ = "c:\new-temp\brusnikin\" & Cstr(i) & " - " & depNameENG & ".csv" 'doc.Otdel1(0) & ".csv" End If Open FileName$ For Output As fileNum% tmpStr = {#"Email,First Name,Last Name,Job Title,Department,Phone Number,Location,Locale,Manager Email"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr End If If Lcase(doc.Otdel3(0)) <> Lcase("Институт ИТ и бизнес-администрирования") Then If doc.E_mail(0) = "" Then tmpStr = {#"noname@iba.by} Elseif Lcase(Strright(doc.E_mail(0), ".")) = Lcase("eu") Then tmpStr = {#"} & Strleft(doc.E_mail(0), "@") & "@iba.by" 'Elseif Strright(doc.E_mail(0), ".") = "kz" Then
Else tmpStr = {#"} & doc.E_mail(0) End If tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strconv(doc.EngFirstName(0), 3) tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strconv(doc.EngLastName(0), 3) If doc.JobTitle(0) = "Внештатный сотрудник" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",Freelancer" Else If Not postv Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = postv.GetDocumentByKey(doc.JobTitle(0)) If tmpDoc Is Nothing Then tmpStr = tmpStr & doc.JobTitle(0) & "," Else If Instr(1, tmpDoc.PostENG(0), ",", 5) > 0 Then tmpStr = tmpStr & {,"} & tmpDoc.PostENG(0) & {"} Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.PostENG(0) End If End If End If End If If Not departUN Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = departUN.GetDocumentByKey(getDepartment(doc.DepartUN)) u= Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) If Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) => 1 Then depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(1) Else depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(0) End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & depNameENG 'tmpStr = tmpStr & "," If doc.Otdel1(0) = "IBA Гомель" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA Gomel" Elseif doc.Otdel1(0) = "МДА" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA" Elseif Strleft(doc.Otdel1(0), " ") = "Департамент" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA IT Park" Else tmpStr = tmpStr & ",," & doc.Otdel1(0) End If tmpStr = tmpStr & ",ru_RU" Set tmpDoc = piople.GetDocumentByKey(doc.ChiefOtd(0)) If Not tmpDoc Is Nothing Then If Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "akoulich" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," Elseif Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "s_levteev" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," Else If Lcase(Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".")) = Lcase("eu") Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") & "@iba.by" 'Elseif Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".") = "kz" Then
Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.E_mail(0) End If End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & {"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr End If Set doc = view.GetNextDocument(doc) Loop Close fileNum% End Sub

Function getDepartment (DepartUN As Variant) As String 'Dim s As New NotesSession 'Dim cdb As NotesDatabase 'Dim strcode As String Dim idarr(3) As String
idarr(0) = "81" idarr(1) = "86" idarr(2) = "87" idarr(3) = "88"
'Set cdb = s.CurrentDatabase '"100z"+6. If DepartUN(0)="1" Then If Arraygetindex( idarr, DepartUN(1)) > 0 Then getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) & ";" & DepartUN(1) & ";" & DepartUN(2) Else getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) & ";" & DepartUN(1) End If Else getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) End If ' return getDepartment End Function

Function formatPhone (pon As String) As String Dim l As Integer Dim phone(15) As String Dim i As Integer Dim t As Boolean i = 14 l = Len(pon) 'pone = "+375"
For i = 11 To 0 Step -1 If (l <> 0) And Isnumeric(Right(Left(pon, l), 1)) Then phone(i) = Right(Left(pon, l), 1) l = l - 1 Elseif l <> 0 Then i = i + 1 l = l - 1 End If Next For i = 0 To Ubound(phone) formatPhone = formatPhone & phone(i) Next
End Function

nonameFileNum% = Freefile() nonameFileName$ = "D:\brusnikin\nonameuserlist.csv" Open nonameFileName$ For Output As nonameFileNum% tmpStr = {#"Email,First Name,Last Name,Job Title,Department,Phone Number,Location,Locale,Manager Email"#} Write #nonameFileNum%, tmpStr
Do Until doc Is Nothing If Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) = Lcase("IBA IT Park") Then currentDep = Lcase(doc.Otdel2(0)) Else currentDep = Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) End If 'If currentDep <> dep Then If Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) = Lcase("IBA IT Park") Then dep = Lcase(doc.Otdel2(0)) Else dep = Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) End If

Function formatPhone (pon As String) As String Dim l As Integer Dim phone(15) As String Dim i As Integer Dim t As Boolean i = 14 l = Len(pon) 'pone = "+375"
For i = 11 To 0 Step -1 If (l <> 0) And Isnumeric(Right(Left(pon, l), 1)) Then phone(i) = Right(Left(pon, l), 1) l = l - 1 Elseif l <> 0 Then i = i + 1 l = l - 1 End If Next For i = 0 To Ubound(phone) formatPhone = formatPhone & phone(i) Next
End Function

' Get an unused file number so LotusScript can open a file.

fileNum% = Freefile() counter% = 0 Open "D:\brusnikin\2\b.csv" For Input As fileNum% Do While Not Eof(fileNum%) ' Read each line of the file. Line Input #fileNum%, txt$ ' Increment the line count. counter% = counter% + 1 Loop ' Return the file pointer to the beginning of the file. %REM arrayOfRecs(countRec%).URI$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).UserID$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).JobTitle$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Department$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).PhoneNumber$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Location$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Admin$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Source$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).CreationDate$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Claimed$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ClaimedDate$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ClaimLink$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Status$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).InvitedDate$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ManagerEmail$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).HasProfilePicture$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Followers$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).LoginApprovalsEnabled$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActivitySummaryforDate$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastDay$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastMonthonWorkplaceMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastWeekonWorkplaceMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastDayonWorkplaceMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastMonthonWorkChatMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastWeekonWorkChatMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastDayonWorkChatMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).MessagesLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).MessagesLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).MessagesLastDay$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).PostsLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).PostsLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).PostsLastDay$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).CommentsLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).CommentsLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).CommentsLastDay$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ContributorRankLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ContributorRankLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ContributorRankLastDay$ %ENDREM
Next Close fileNum% Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument Do Until doc Is Nothing For i = 1 To Ubound(arrayOfRecs) 'Set tmpDoc = piople.GetDocumentByKey(arrayOfRecs(i).FullName$) If Ucase(doc.E_mail(0)) = Ucase(arrayOfRecs(i).Email$) Then Call doc.ReplaceItemValue("a", "1") Call doc.Save(True, False) arrayOfRecs(i).Ready = True End If Next Set doc = view.GetNextDocument(doc) Loop Call filloutFile() fileNum% = Freefile() fileName$ = "d:\brusnikin\UsersWhoIsReady.csv" Open FileName$ For Output As fileNum% For i = 1 To Ubound(arrayOfRecs) If arrayOfRecs(i).Ready = False Then tmpStr = tmpStr & {#"} & arrayOfRecs(i).FullName$ & "," & arrayOfRecs(i).Email$ & {"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr End If Next Close fileNum% End Sub

Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.E_mail(0) End If 'End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & {"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr
Call doc.RemoveItem("a") Call doc.Save(True, False) End If Set doc = view.GetNextDocument(doc) Loop Close fileNum% End Function

Sub Queryopendocument(Source As Notesuiview, Continue As Variant) Dim ws As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim session As New NotesSession Dim db As NotesDatabase Dim view As NotesView Dim uidoc As NotesUIDocument Dim cdoc As NotesDocument Dim doc As NotesDocument Dim flg As Integer
Continue = False
Set uidoc = ws.CurrentDocument Set cdoc = uidoc.Document Set doc = Source.Documents.GetFirstDocument flg = ws.DialogBox ("Work CurrentProject", True, True, False, False, False, False, "Участие в проекте", doc, True) If flg Then Call doc.Save (True, False) Set db = session.CurrentDatabase Set view = db.GetView("(WExpDocuments)") Call view.Refresh Call ws.ViewRefresh End If End Sub

code.lotusscript:
Sub Click(Source As Button) Dim ws As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim doc As NotesDocument Dim db As NotesDatabase Dim s As New NotesSession Dim coll As NotesDocumentCollection Dim uiv As NotesUIView Dim view As NotesView, postv As NotesView, departUN As NotesView, people As NotesView Dim tmpDoc As NotesDocument Dim tmpStr As String, curentDep As String, dep As String Dim i As Integer
Set db = ws.CurrentDatabase.Database Set uiv = ws.CurrentView Set view = uiv.View Set postv = db.GetView("ListPostsAll") Set departUN = db.GetView({(1.Подразделения\DepartUN)}) Set piople = db.GetView({Employees\ByFullName})
Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument dep = "" i = 0 Do Until doc Is Nothing If Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) = Lcase("IBA IT Park") Then currentDep = Lcase(doc.Otdel2(0)) Else currentDep = Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) End If If currentDep <> dep Then If Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) = Lcase("IBA IT Park") Then dep = Lcase(doc.Otdel2(0)) Else dep = Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) End If
If dep <> "мда" Then Close fileNum%
fileNum% = Freefile() i = i +1 If Not departUN Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = departUN.GetDocumentByKey(getDepartment(doc.DepartUN)) u= Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) If Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) => 1 Then depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(1) Else depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(0) End If End If If Lcase(doc.Otdel1(0)) = Lcase("IBA IT Park") Then fileName$ = "c:\new-temp\brusnikin\" & Cstr(i) & " - " & depNameENG & ".csv" ' doc.Otdel2(0) & ".csv" Else fileName$ = "c:\new-temp\brusnikin\" & Cstr(i) & " - " & depNameENG & ".csv" 'doc.Otdel1(0) & ".csv" End If Open FileName$ For Output As fileNum% tmpStr = {#"Email,First Name,Last Name,Job Title,Department,Phone Number,Location,Locale,Manager Email"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr End If If Lcase(doc.Otdel3(0)) <> Lcase("Институт ИТ и бизнес-администрирования") Then If doc.E_mail(0) = "" Then tmpStr = {#"noname@iba.by} Elseif Lcase(Strright(doc.E_mail(0), ".")) = Lcase("eu") Then tmpStr = {#"} & Strleft(doc.E_mail(0), "@") & "@iba.by" 'Elseif Strright(doc.E_mail(0), ".") = "kz" Then
Else tmpStr = {#"} & doc.E_mail(0) End If tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strconv(doc.EngFirstName(0), 3) tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strconv(doc.EngLastName(0), 3) If doc.JobTitle(0) = "Внештатный сотрудник" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",Freelancer" Else If Not postv Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = postv.GetDocumentByKey(doc.JobTitle(0)) If tmpDoc Is Nothing Then tmpStr = tmpStr & doc.JobTitle(0) & "," Else If Instr(1, tmpDoc.PostENG(0), ",", 5) > 0 Then tmpStr = tmpStr & {,"} & tmpDoc.PostENG(0) & {"} Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.PostENG(0) End If End If End If End If If Not departUN Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = departUN.GetDocumentByKey(getDepartment(doc.DepartUN)) u= Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) If Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) => 1 Then depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(1) Else depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(0) End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & depNameENG 'tmpStr = tmpStr & "," If doc.Otdel1(0) = "IBA Гомель" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA Gomel" Elseif doc.Otdel1(0) = "МДА" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA" Elseif Strleft(doc.Otdel1(0), " ") = "Департамент" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA IT Park" Else tmpStr = tmpStr & ",," & doc.Otdel1(0) End If tmpStr = tmpStr & ",ru_RU" Set tmpDoc = piople.GetDocumentByKey(doc.ChiefOtd(0)) If Not tmpDoc Is Nothing Then If Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "akoulich" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," Elseif Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "s_levteev" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," Else If Lcase(Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".")) = Lcase("eu") Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") & "@iba.by" 'Elseif Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".") = "kz" Then
Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.E_mail(0) End If End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & {"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr End If Set doc = view.GetNextDocument(doc) Loop Close fileNum% End Sub

Function getDepartment (DepartUN As Variant) As String 'Dim s As New NotesSession 'Dim cdb As NotesDatabase 'Dim strcode As String Dim idarr(3) As String
idarr(0) = "81" idarr(1) = "86" idarr(2) = "87" idarr(3) = "88"
'Set cdb = s.CurrentDatabase '"100z"+6. If DepartUN(0)="1" Then If Arraygetindex( idarr, DepartUN(1)) > 0 Then getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) & ";" & DepartUN(1) & ";" & DepartUN(2) Else getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) & ";" & DepartUN(1) End If Else getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) End If ' return getDepartment End Function

Function formatPhone (pon As String) As String Dim l As Integer Dim phone(15) As String Dim i As Integer Dim t As Boolean i = 14 l = Len(pon) 'pone = "+375"
For i = 11 To 0 Step -1 If (l <> 0) And Isnumeric(Right(Left(pon, l), 1)) Then phone(i) = Right(Left(pon, l), 1) l = l - 1 Elseif l <> 0 Then i = i + 1 l = l - 1 End If Next For i = 0 To Ubound(phone) formatPhone = formatPhone & phone(i) Next
End Function

For i = 11 To 0 Step -1 If (l <> 0) And Isnumeric(Right(Left(pon, l), 1)) Then phone(i) = Right(Left(pon, l), 1) l = l - 1 Elseif l <> 0 Then i = i + 1 l = l - 1 End If Next For i = 0 To Ubound(phone) formatPhone = formatPhone & phone(i) Next

Type RecType FullName As String Email As String Ready As Boolean %REM URI As String UserID As String JobTitle As String Department As String PhoneNumber As String Location As String Admin As String Source As String CreationDate As String Claimed As String ClaimedDate As String ClaimLink As String Status As String InvitedDate As String ManagerEmail As String HasProfilePicture As String Followers As String LoginApprovalsEnabled As String ActivitySummaryforDate As String ActiveLastMonth As String ActiveLastWeek As String ActiveLastDay As String ActiveLastMonthonWorkplaceMobileApp As String ActiveLastWeekonWorkplaceMobileApp As String ActiveLastDayonWorkplaceMobileApp As String ActiveLastMonthonWorkChatMobileApp As String ActiveLastWeekonWorkChatMobileApp As String ActiveLastDayonWorkChatMobileApp As String MessagesLastMonth As String MessagesLastWeek As String MessagesLastDay As String PostsLastMonth As String PostsLastWeek As String PostsLastDay As String CommentsLastMonth As String CommentsLastWeek As String CommentsLastDay As String ContributorRankLastMonth As String ContributorRankLastWeek As String ContributorRankLastDay As String %ENDREM End Type

Sub Click(Source As Button) Dim ws As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim arrayOfRecs() As RecType Dim i As Integer ' A dynamic array that will get sized to ' the number of lines in c:\123w\work\thenames.txt Dim txt As String Dim fileNum As Integer Dim counter As Integer Dim countRec As Integer Dim s As New NotesSession Dim db As NotesDatabase Dim piople As NotesView, view As NotesView Dim tmpDoc As NotesDocument, doc As NotesDocument
' Get an unused file number so LotusScript can open a file.
Set db = s.CurrentDatabase Set view = ws.CurrentView.View Set piople = db.GetView({Employees\ByFullName})
fileNum% = Freefile() counter% = 0 Open "D:\brusnikin\2\b.csv" For Input As fileNum% Do While Not Eof(fileNum%) ' Read each line of the file. Line Input #fileNum%, txt$ ' Increment the line count. counter% = counter% + 1 Loop ' Return the file pointer to the beginning of the file. Seek fileNum%, 1 ' The file has counter number of lines in it, so ' arrayOfRecs() is defined with that number of elements. Redim arrayOfRecs(1 To counter%) ' Read the contents of the file into arrayOfRecs. For countRec% = 1 To counter%
Input #fileNum%, arrayOfRecs(countRec%).FullName$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Email$
%REM arrayOfRecs(countRec%).URI$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).UserID$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).JobTitle$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Department$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).PhoneNumber$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Location$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Admin$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Source$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).CreationDate$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Claimed$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ClaimedDate$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ClaimLink$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Status$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).InvitedDate$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ManagerEmail$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).HasProfilePicture$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Followers$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).LoginApprovalsEnabled$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActivitySummaryforDate$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastDay$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastMonthonWorkplaceMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastWeekonWorkplaceMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastDayonWorkplaceMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastMonthonWorkChatMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastWeekonWorkChatMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastDayonWorkChatMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).MessagesLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).MessagesLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).MessagesLastDay$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).PostsLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).PostsLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).PostsLastDay$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).CommentsLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).CommentsLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).CommentsLastDay$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ContributorRankLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ContributorRankLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ContributorRankLastDay$ %ENDREM
Next Close fileNum% Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument Do Until doc Is Nothing For i = 1 To Ubound(arrayOfRecs) 'Set tmpDoc = piople.GetDocumentByKey(arrayOfRecs(i).FullName$) If Ucase(doc.E_mail(0)) = Ucase(arrayOfRecs(i).Email$) Then Call doc.ReplaceItemValue("a", "1") Call doc.Save(True, False) arrayOfRecs(i).Ready = True End If Next Set doc = view.GetNextDocument(doc) Loop Call filloutFile() fileNum% = Freefile() fileName$ = "d:\brusnikin\UsersWhoIsReady.csv" Open FileName$ For Output As fileNum% For i = 1 To Ubound(arrayOfRecs) If arrayOfRecs(i).Ready = False Then tmpStr = tmpStr & {#"} & arrayOfRecs(i).FullName$ & "," & arrayOfRecs(i).Email$ & {"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr End If Next Close fileNum% End Sub

Function filloutFile() Dim s As New NotesSession Dim ws As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim uiv As NotesUIView Dim doc As NotesDocument, tmpDoc As NotesDocument Dim view As NotesView, piople As NotesView, departUN As NotesView, postv As NotesView Dim tmpString As String Dim db As NotesDatabase
Set db = s.CurrentDatabase Set uiv = ws.CurrentView Set view = uiv.View Set postv = db.GetView("ListPostsAll") Set departUN = db.GetView({(1.Подразделения\DepartUN)}) Set piople = db.GetView({Employees\ByFullName})
Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument
fileNum% = Freefile() fileName$ = "d:\brusnikin\Users.csv" Open FileName$ For Output As fileNum% tmpStr = {#"Email,First Name,Last Name,Job Title,Department,Phone Number,Location,Locale,Manager Email"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr
Do Until doc Is Nothing If doc.a(0) <> "" Then If doc.E_mail(0) = "" Then tmpStr = {#"noname@iba.by} Elseif Strright(doc.E_mail(0), ".") = "eu" Then tmpStr = {#"} & Strleft(doc.E_mail(0), "@") & "@iba.by" 'Elseif Strright(doc.E_mail(0), ".") = "kz" Then
Else tmpStr = {#"} & doc.E_mail(0) End If tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strconv(doc.EngFirstName(0), 3) tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strconv(doc.EngLastName(0), 3) If doc.JobTitle(0) = "Внештатный сотрудник" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "Freelancer," Else If Not postv Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = postv.GetDocumentByKey(doc.JobTitle(0)) If tmpDoc Is Nothing Then tmpStr = tmpStr & doc.JobTitle(0) & "," Else If Instr(1, tmpDoc.PostENG(0), ",", 5) > 0 Then tmpStr = tmpStr & {,"} & tmpDoc.PostENG(0) & {"} Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.PostENG(0) End If End If End If End If If Not departUN Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = departUN.GetDocumentByKey(getDepartment(doc.DepartUN)) u= Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) If Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) => 1 Then depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(1) Else depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(0) End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & depNameENG 'tmpStr = tmpStr & "," If doc.Otdel1(0) = "IBA Гомель" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA Gomel" Elseif doc.Otdel1(0) = "МДА" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA" Elseif Strleft(doc.Otdel1(0), " ") = "Департамент" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA IT Park" Else tmpStr = tmpStr & ",," & doc.Otdel1(0) End If tmpStr = tmpStr & ",ru_RU" Set tmpDoc = piople.GetDocumentByKey(doc.ChiefOtd(0)) If Not tmpDoc Is Nothing Then 'If Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "akoulich" Then ' tmpStr = tmpStr & "," 'Elseif Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "s_levteev" Then ' tmpStr = tmpStr & "," 'Else If Lcase(Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".")) = Lcase("eu") Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") & "@iba.by" 'Elseif Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".") = "kz" Then
Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.E_mail(0) End If 'End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & {"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr
Call doc.RemoveItem("a") Call doc.Save(True, False) End If Set doc = view.GetNextDocument(doc) Loop Close fileNum% End Function

Sub Click(Source As Button) Dim ws As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim arrayOfRecs() As RecType Dim i As Integer ' A dynamic array that will get sized to ' the number of lines in c:\123w\work\thenames.txt Dim txt As String Dim fileNum As Integer Dim counter As Integer Dim countRec As Integer Dim s As New NotesSession Dim db As NotesDatabase Dim piople As NotesView, view As NotesView Dim tmpDoc As NotesDocument, doc As NotesDocument
' Get an unused file number so LotusScript can open a file.
Set db = s.CurrentDatabase Set view = ws.CurrentView.View Set piople = db.GetView({Employees\ByFullName})
fileNum% = Freefile() counter% = 0 Open "D:\brusnikin\2\c.csv" For Input As fileNum% Do While Not Eof(fileNum%) ' Read each line of the file. Line Input #fileNum%, txt$ ' Increment the line count. counter% = counter% + 1 Loop ' Return the file pointer to the beginning of the file. Seek fileNum%, 1 ' The file has counter number of lines in it, so ' arrayOfRecs() is defined with that number of elements. Redim arrayOfRecs(1 To counter%) ' Read the contents of the file into arrayOfRecs. For countRec% = 1 To counter%
Input #fileNum%, arrayOfRecs(countRec%).FullName$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Email$
%REM arrayOfRecs(countRec%).URI$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).UserID$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).JobTitle$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Department$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).PhoneNumber$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Location$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Admin$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Source$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).CreationDate$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Claimed$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ClaimedDate$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ClaimLink$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Status$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).InvitedDate$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ManagerEmail$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).HasProfilePicture$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).Followers$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).LoginApprovalsEnabled$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActivitySummaryforDate$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastDay$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastMonthonWorkplaceMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastWeekonWorkplaceMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastDayonWorkplaceMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastMonthonWorkChatMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastWeekonWorkChatMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ActiveLastDayonWorkChatMobileApp$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).MessagesLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).MessagesLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).MessagesLastDay$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).PostsLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).PostsLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).PostsLastDay$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).CommentsLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).CommentsLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).CommentsLastDay$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ContributorRankLastMonth$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ContributorRankLastWeek$, _ arrayOfRecs(countRec%).ContributorRankLastDay$ %ENDREM
Next Close fileNum% Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument Do Until doc Is Nothing For i = 1 To Ubound(arrayOfRecs) 'Set tmpDoc = piople.GetDocumentByKey(arrayOfRecs(i).FullName$) If Ucase(doc.FullName(0)) = Ucase(arrayOfRecs(i).FullName$) Then Call doc.ReplaceItemValue("a", "1") Call doc.Save(True, False) arrayOfRecs(i).Ready = True End If Next Set doc = view.GetNextDocument(doc) Loop Call filloutFile() fileNum% = Freefile() fileName$ = "d:\brusnikin\UsersWhoIsReady.csv" Open FileName$ For Output As fileNum% For i = 1 To Ubound(arrayOfRecs) If arrayOfRecs(i).Ready = False Then tmpStr = tmpStr & {#"} & arrayOfRecs(i).FullName$ & "," & arrayOfRecs(i).Email$ & {"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr End If Next Close fileNum% End Sub

Function filloutFile() Dim s As New NotesSession Dim ws As New NotesUIWorkspace Dim uiv As NotesUIView Dim doc As NotesDocument, tmpDoc As NotesDocument Dim view As NotesView, piople As NotesView, departUN As NotesView, postv As NotesView Dim tmpString As String Dim db As NotesDatabase
Set db = s.CurrentDatabase Set uiv = ws.CurrentView Set view = uiv.View Set postv = db.GetView("ListPostsAll") Set departUN = db.GetView({(1.Подразделения\DepartUN)}) Set piople = db.GetView({Employees\ByFullName})
Set doc = view.GetFirstDocument
fileNum% = Freefile() fileName$ = "d:\brusnikin\Users.csv" Open FileName$ For Output As fileNum% tmpStr = {#"Email,First Name,Last Name,Job Title,Department,Phone Number,Location,Locale,Manager Email"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr
Do Until doc Is Nothing If doc.a(0) <> "" Then If doc.E_mail(0) = "" Then tmpStr = {#"noname@iba.by} Elseif Strright(doc.E_mail(0), ".") = "eu" Then tmpStr = {#"} & Strleft(doc.E_mail(0), "@") & "@iba.by" 'Elseif Strright(doc.E_mail(0), ".") = "kz" Then
Else tmpStr = {#"} & doc.E_mail(0) End If tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strconv(doc.EngFirstName(0), 3) tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strconv(doc.EngLastName(0), 3) If doc.JobTitle(0) = "Внештатный сотрудник" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "Freelancer," Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," %REM If Not postv Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = postv.GetDocumentByKey(doc.JobTitle(0)) If tmpDoc Is Nothing Then tmpStr = tmpStr & doc.JobTitle(0) & "," Else If Instr(1, tmpDoc.PostENG(0), ",", 5) > 0 Then tmpStr = tmpStr & {,"} & tmpDoc.PostENG(0) & {"} Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.PostENG(0) End If End If End If %ENDREM End If %REM If Not departUN Is Nothing Then Set tmpDoc = departUN.GetDocumentByKey(getDepartment(doc.DepartUN)) u= Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) If Ubound(tmpDoc.SteckENG) => 1 Then depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(1) Else depNameENG = tmpDoc.SteckENG(0) End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & depNameENG %ENDREM tmpStr = tmpStr & "," If doc.Otdel1(0) = "IBA Гомель" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA Gomel" Elseif doc.Otdel1(0) = "МДА" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA" Elseif Strleft(doc.Otdel1(0), " ") = "Департамент" Then tmpStr = tmpStr & ",,IBA IT Park" Else tmpStr = tmpStr & ",," & doc.Otdel1(0) End If
tmpStr = tmpStr & ",ru_RU" Set tmpDoc = piople.GetDocumentByKey(doc.ChiefOtd(0)) If Not tmpDoc Is Nothing Then 'If Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "akoulich" Then ' tmpStr = tmpStr & "," 'Elseif Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") = "s_levteev" Then ' tmpStr = tmpStr & "," 'Else If Lcase(Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".")) = Lcase("eu") Then tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & Strleft(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), "@") & "@iba.by" 'Elseif Strright(tmpDoc.E_mail(0), ".") = "kz" Then
Else tmpStr = tmpStr & "," & tmpDoc.E_mail(0) End If 'End If End If tmpStr = tmpStr & {"#} Write #fileNum%, tmpStr
Call doc.RemoveItem("a") Call doc.Save(True, False) End If Set doc = view.GetNextDocument(doc) Loop Close fileNum% End Function

Function getDepartment (DepartUN As Variant) As String 'Dim s As New NotesSession 'Dim cdb As NotesDatabase 'Dim strcode As String Dim idarr(3) As String
idarr(0) = "81" idarr(1) = "86" idarr(2) = "87" idarr(3) = "88"
'Set cdb = s.CurrentDatabase '"100z"+6. If DepartUN(0)="1" Then If Arraygetindex( idarr, DepartUN(1)) > 0 Then getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) & ";" & DepartUN(1) & ";" & DepartUN(2) Else getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) & ";" & DepartUN(1) End If Else getDepartment = "100z" & DepartUN(0) End If ' return getDepartment End Function
